title: How to know the game mode each weekend?
body: I was wondering if riot let us players know which game mode is going to be on each weekend? Please leave a link to where I can view this. Thabks in advance

replies.body:
There's isn't a consolidated calendar of the rotating game modes that are planned, unfortunately. You can find any announcements for RGM's on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/), as we tend to announce the dates for these modes before they go live.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
Two more questions... Will urf ever go back to champ ban and pick or forever random? And will urf ever be considered to be a permanent game mode, Like rift and aram

Unfortunately, as I don't work on the teams that develop Game Modes, I don't have answers to those questions for you. Your best bet for finding an answer to these questions would be to post them on our [**Ask Riot page**](https://ask.leagueoflegends.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

If you have any other questions, let me know.
